analysis.description:
Heritable.ownerLives (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol#463-464) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeOfDeath_ == 0

Heritable.claimHeirOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol#442-454) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= timeOfDeath_ + heartbeatTimeout_) (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol#443-449)

Heritable.ownerLives (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol#463-464) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeOfDeath_ == 0 (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol#464)

HawkToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol)
HawkToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol)
HawkToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xf8a551eab66823c5847af6b43bc711b0f5314f41.sol)
